title: Scheduled NA Maintenance - October 19, 2023
content: We will be performing a scheduled maintenance for NA Worlds on Thursday, October 19, 2023 at 5:00 AM PDT (8:00 AM EDT / 2:00 PM CEST / 11:00 PM AEDT).

title: Maple Memo: GMS Roadmap Q4 2023
